Package com.example.androidproject

Class MoodMediaManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.androidproject.MoodMediaManager
public class MoodMediaManager extends Object
Manages media operations like images and location for mood editing

    • MoodMediaManager

      public MoodMediaManager(android.app.Activity activity, android.widget.ImageView moodImageView, android.widget.TextView locationTextView, androidx.cardview.widget.CardView imagePreviewCardView, androidx.cardview.widget.CardView locationPreviewCardView, android.widget.TextView addImageText, android.widget.TextView removeImageText, android.widget.ImageView imageButtonIcon)
      Creats a constructor for mood media manager
      Parameters:
      activity - current activity
      moodImageView - image button
      locationTextView - location button
      imagePreviewCardView - card where preview image is displayed
      locationPreviewCardView - preview of the location
      addImageText - text that says to add image
      removeImageText - text that displays temove image
      imageButtonIcon - image button
